attributes.action: Introduce Conscription for anyone (male/female) who leaves school before 18 and is unemployed.
attributes.additional_details:
The Riots have highlighted the lack of respect, education and common decency many young people have in todays Britain.

This is arguably down to a number of factors - too much political correctness/ rights (they have been spoilt and don't realise how lucky they are); poor parenting; lack of job/activities.

By re-introducing conscription for any young person living in the UK under 18 who is unemployed these youth's would be given a stern lesson in respect and obedience whilst also being given a purpose and job.

If a youth is enrolled on the conscription programme they would have to serve until the age of 21.
